title: Parts Cashflow Analysis
summary: This document contains a detailed cashflow analysis for various parts and products over multiple years, from 2025 to 2030. The 'Parts - Cashflow' sheet summarizes total cashflow for different product types, while the 'Capital Parts Cashflow Template' sheet provides a comprehensive breakdown of costs associated with specific parts, including launch dates, legal entities, suppliers, and monthly cost projections. The data includes columns for total costs per month and year, along with specific calculations for each part's financial requirements.
